text: April Love is a 1957 American musical movie. It was directed by Henry Levin. The movie is based on the book Phantom Filly by George Andrew Chamberlain. Actors include Pat Boone, Shirley Jones, Arthur O'Connell, Dolores Michaels, Matt Crowley, and Jeanette Nolan. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1958. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin
title: April Love (movie)
